original_text: The people pounced on the spoil and took sheep and oxen and calves and slaughtered them on the ground. And the people ate them with the blood.
korean_text: 백성이 이에 탈취한 물건에 달려가서 양과 소와 송아지들을 끌어다가 그것을 땅에서 잡아 피째 먹었더니

sentences.original_text: The people pounced on the spoil
and took sheep and oxen and calves
and slaughtered them on the ground.
And the people ate them with the blood.
sentences.korean_translation: 백성이 피를 채운 채 그것을 먹었다
